summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ad Campaign Performance Analytics Dashboard. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are working excellently with 93.75% backend success rate and 100% frontend success rate. All core features including authentication, campaign management, analytics, and AI recommendations are functional.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_issues.impact: Very minor - both status codes indicate authentication required

passed_tests: Dashboard overview with summary cards and charts
Analytics page with multiple chart types
Mock data generation for Google Ads and Facebook Ads
Campaign insights table with performance metrics
